name: Castform Rainy Form
description:
This is Castform's form when pelted by rain. In an
 experiment where it was placed in a shower,
 this Pokémon didn't change to this form.

abilities.name: Weather Reading
abilities.effect: If you have 8 or more Stadium cards in your discard pile, ignore all Energy in this Pokémon’s attack costs.

attacks.name: Rainfall
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
